verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of David<WH1732>. The LORD<WH3068> is my shepherd<WH7462>; I shall not want<WH2637>.
He maketh me to lie down<WH7257> in green<WH1877> pastures<WH4999>: he leadeth<WH5095> me beside the still<WH4496> waters<WH4325>.
He restoreth<WH7725> my soul<WH5315>: he leadeth<WH5148> me in the paths<WH4570> of righteousness<WH6664> for his name's<WH8034> sake.

Yea, though I walk<WH3212> through the valley<WH1516> of the shadow of death<WH6757>, I will fear<WH3372> no evil<WH7451>: for thou art with me; thy rod<WH7626> and thy staff<WH4938> they comfort<WH5162> me.
Thou preparest<WH6186> a table<WH7979> before<WH6440> me in the presence of mine enemies<WH6887>: thou anointest<WH1878> my head<WH7218> with oil<WH8081>; my cup<WH3563> runneth over<WH7310>.
Surely goodness<WH2896> and mercy<WH2617> shall follow<WH7291> me all the days<WH3117> of my life<WH2416>: and I will dwell<WH3427> in the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> for ever<WH753><WH3117>.
